entry.title: ABOUT ME
entry.content: I am a Ph.D. student at the Institute of Computing Technology of Chinese Academy of Sciences under the supervision of Professor Yinhe Han and Professor Xiaowei Li. Before coming to CAS, I obtained my Bachelor degree in 2016 from the Department of Information Engineering, China University of Geosciences (Wuhan). My research interests primarily focus on the area of Hardware/Software Co-design for reducing power and improving performance with specialized brain-inspired accelerators.

entry.title: PUBLICATIONS
entry.content:
Journals

  • Cong Shi, Jiajun Li, Ying Wang, and Gang Luo. Exploiting Lightweight Statistical Learning for Event-Based Vision Processing. In IEEE Acess, 2018. (SCI, IF=3.557) [PDF]
  • Bosheng Liu, Xiaoming Chen, Yinhe Han, Jiajun Li, Haobo Xu, Xiaowei Li. Accelerating DNN-based 3D Point Cloud Processing for Mobile Computing. the SCIENCE CHINA Information Sciences, 2019. (SCI, IF=2.731)

Conferences

  • Haobo Xu, Ying Wang, Yujie Wang, Jiajun Li, Bosheng Liu and Yinhe Han. ACG-Engine: An Inference Accelerator for Content Generative Neural Networks. In IEEE/ACM Proceedings of 2019 International Conference On Computer Aided Design (ICCAD’19).
  • Jiajun Li, Ying Wang, Bosheng Liu, Yinhe Han, and Xiaowei Li. Simulate-the-hardware: Training Accurate Binarized Neural Networks for Low-Precision Neural Accelerators. In IEEE/ACM Proceedings of 24th Asia and South Pacific Design Automation Conference (ASP-DAC’19). [PDF]
  • Bosheng Liu, Xiaoming Chen, Ying Wang, Yinhe Han, Jiajun Li, Haobo Xu, Xiaowei Li. Addressing the Issue of Processing Element Under-Utilization in General-Purpose Systolic Deep Learning Accelerators. In IEEE/ACM Proceedings of 24th Asia and South Pacific Design Automation Conference (ASP-DAC’19). [PDF]
  • Jiajun Li, Ying Wang, Yinhe Han, and Xiaowei Li. Training Effective Binarized Neural Networks for Intelligent Edge Devices Neural Network Accelerator. In Proceedings of Chinese Testing Conference (CTC’18).
  • Ying Wang, Zhenyu Quan, Jiajun Li, Yinhe Han, Huawei Li, and Xiaowei Li. A Retrospective Evaluation of Energy-Efficient Object Detection Solutions for Embedded Devices. In IEEE/ACM Proceedings of 2018 Design, Automation and Test in Europe conference (DATE’18). [PDF]
  • Cheng Wang, Ying Wang, Yinhe Han, Lili Song, Zhenyu Quan, Jiajun Li, and Xiaowei Li. CNN-based object detection solutions for embedded heterogeneous multi-core SoCs. In IEEE/ACM Proceedings of 22nd Asia and South Pacific Design Automation Conference (ASP-DAC’17). [PDF]

Others

  • Jiajun Li, Zhiming Li. A Method of Testing the Convergence of Series. Studies in College Mathematics, 2014. [PDF]
    I am grateful to Prof. Zhiming Li for the guidance in my first-year undergraduate.

entry.title: SELECTED HONOR & AWARD
entry.content:
• Merit Student, University of Chinese Academy of Sciences, Jul 2017, Jun 2018, May 2019.
  • Director Excellent Scholarship, Institute of Computing Technology of Chinese Academy of Sciences, Jan 2019.
  • Excellent Student Cadre, University of Chinese Academy of Sciences, Jun 2018.
  • Badminton Championship of Capital Universities 2nd, Federation of University Sports of Beijing, Apr 2017.
  • Outstanding B.E. Degree Thesis of Hubei Province, Hubei Provincial Department of Education, Jan 2017
  • Chinese Academy of Sciences Undergraduate Scholarship, Chinese Academy of Sciences, Dec 2016
  • Low-Power Image Recognition Challenge 2016 (1st in Track 1 and 3), IEEE Rebooting Computing, May 2016.
  • National Scholarship, Ministry of Education of the People’s Republic of China, Nov 2014
  • 19th FIRA RoboWorld Cup 2014 (2nd), Federation of International Robot-soccer Association, Nov 2014.
  • Academician Scholarship, China University of Geosciences (Wuhan), Dec 2013
